attributes.action: Ban working when it is a sunny day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the world would be a happier and lovelier place if we didn't have to work when the sun was shining. During the winter we should work normal hours and during the summer work early evenings until late. As long as your work is done you should be free to do whatever you wish.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
